bibl.title: Dipinti in Late Antiquity and Shenoute's Monastic Federation: Text and Image in the Paintings of the Red Monastery.
bibl.note: Concerne des dipinti coptes. - Voir pp. 112-114: Dipinti in Late Antiquity: a Brief Survey.
DILLEY Paul, Dipinti in Late Antiquity and Shenoute's Monastic Federation: Text and Image in the Paintings of the Red Monastery.
